paragraphs.eliquid: Enjoy our great Vapetasia flavors in your favorite vaporizers. Vapetasia offers its flavors in 0mg, 3mg, 6mg, and 12mg options in 100ml bottles.
paragraphs.salt: Experience the same great Vapetasia flavors in your favorite salt nicotine device. Vapetasia offers salt options in nicotine strengths of 12mg, 24mg and 48mg in 30ml bottles.
paragraphs.eliquid-60ml: Enjoy our great Vapetasia flavors in your favorite vaporizers. Vapetasia offers its flavors in 0mg, 3mg, 6mg, and 12mg options in 60ml bottles.
paragraphs.eliquid-100ml: Enjoy our great Vapetasia flavors in your favorite vaporizers. Vapetasia offers its flavors in 0mg, 3mg, 6mg, and 12mg options in 100ml bottles.
paragraphs.disposable-killer: Enjoy Vapetasia flavors in convenient disposables. Vapetasia offers unique flavors in 10ml 3500 puff, 5% Nicotine, 1.5 Ohm rechargeable disposables.
paragraphs.disposable-vapetasia-x-hyve: Vapetaisa and Hyve collaborated to bring the best of our flavors together with one of the most popular devices in 2500 and 4000 puff counts.
paragraphs.disposable-vapetasia-x-air: Vapetaisa and Air collaborated to bring the best of our flavors together with one of the most popular devices in 6000 puff counts.
paragraphs.disposable: Vapetasia has many disposable choices - Need to update the text here
